verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the seven seals <S%G4973><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> with a voice <S%G5456><s%> of thunder <S%G1027><s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, a white <S%G3022><s%> horse <S%G2462><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> that sat <S%G2521><s%> thereon1909, 846 had <S%G2192><s%> a bow <S%G5115><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there was given <S%G1325><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> a crown <S%G4735><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he came forth <S%G1831><s%> conquering <S%G3528><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> conquer <S%G3528><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he opened <S%G455><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> seal <S%G4973><s%>, I heard <S%G191><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> living creature <S%G2226><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G243><s%> horse came forth <S%G1831><s%>, a red <S%G4450><s%> horse <S%G2462><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> that sat <S%G2521><s%> thereon <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should slay <S%G4969><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> there was given <S%G1325><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> sword <S%G3162><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he opened <S%G455><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> seal <S%G4973><s%>, I heard <S%G191><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> living creature <S%G2226><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, 2532, Proverbs0 a black <S%G3189><s%> horse <S%G2462><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> that sat2521, Esther9 thereon <S%G846><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> a balance <S%G2218><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> as it were a voice <S%G5456><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, A measure <S%G5518><s%> of wheat <S%G4621><s%> for a shilling <S%G1220><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> measures <S%G5518><s%> of barley <S%G2915><s%> for a shilling <S%G1220><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the oil <S%G1637><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> hurt <S%G91><s%> thou not <S%G3361><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he opened <S%G455><s%> the fourth <S%G5067><s%> seal <S%G4973><s%>, I heard <S%G191><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the fourth <S%G5067><s%> living creature <S%G2226><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, a pale <S%G5515><s%> horse <S%G2462><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> upon <S%G1883><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, his name <S%G3686><s%> was Death <S%G2288><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> Hades <S%G86><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> there was given <S%G1325><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the fourth part <S%G5067><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>, to kill <S%G615><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> sword <S%G4501><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> famine <S%G3042><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the wild beasts <S%G2342><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he opened <S%G455><s%> the fifth <S%G3991><s%> seal <S%G4973><s%>, I saw <S%G1492><s%> underneath <S%G5270><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%> the souls <S%G5590><s%> of them <S%G3588><s%> that had been slain <S%G4969><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they held <S%G2192><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> they cried <S%G2896><s%> with a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, How <S%G2193><s%> long <S%G4219><s%>, O Master <S%G1203><s%>, the holy <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> true <S%G228><s%>, dost thou <S%G2919><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> avenge <S%G1556><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> on <S%G575><s%> them that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> there was given <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G1538><s%> to each one a white <S%G3022><s%> robe <S%G4749><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it was said <S%G4483><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they should rest <S%G373><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> for a little <S%G3398><s%> time <S%G5550><s%>, until <S%G2193><s%> their <S%G846><s%> fellow-servants <S%G4889><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, who should <S%G3195><s%> be killed <S%G615><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> they <S%G846><s%> were <S%G3739><s%>, should have fulfilled their course <S%G4137><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he opened <S%G455><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> seal <S%G4973><s%>, and2532, Proverbs0 there was <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake <S%G4578><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> black <S%G3189><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> sackcloth <S%G4526><s%> of hair <S%G5155><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the whole moon <S%G4582><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> the stars <S%G792><s%> of the heaven <S%G3772><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> a fig tree <S%G4808><s%> casteth <S%G906><s%> her <S%G846><s%> unripe figs <S%G3653><s%> when she is shaken <S%G4579><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> a great wind <S%G417><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> was removed <S%G673><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a scroll <S%G975><s%> when it is rolled <S%G1507><s%> up <S%G2532><s%>; and every <S%G3956><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> island <S%G3520><s%> were moved <S%G2795><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> places <S%G5117><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the princes <S%G3175><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the chief captains <S%G5506><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the rich <S%G4145><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the strong <S%G1415><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> bondman <S%G1401><s%> and2532, 3956 freeman <S%G1658><s%>, hid <S%G2928><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the caves <S%G4693><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the rocks <S%G4073><s%> of the mountains <S%G3735><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> they say <S%G3004><s%> to the mountains <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to the rocks <S%G4073><s%>, Fall <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hide <S%G2928><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of him that sitteth <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%>:

for <S%G3754><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%>?
